attributes.action: Allow Foster Girl to convert to christianity
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A Foster girl has been banned from going to church because she was born into a Muslim family. This is clearly wrong and this is happening in Britain.

The United kingdom is supposed to be a free and libral country. This girl's rights have been take away from her. It is by her own free will that she should be allowed to choose for herself about her own religious views. And nobody has the rights to prevent that from going ahead.

rejection.details: The PM is unable to intervene in individual cases. Please contact the relevant authorities with your concerns.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
